Text: Just as a note, this is not the version actually presented by Richard Hammond but instead just has a generic narrator (Martin Ball).

This is not "Richard Hammond's Invisible Worlds".

The Narrator for this release is "Martin Ball"

I haven't watched Richard's version, but I can guess it'll be a lot simpler than this version, whose storytelling is marvelous, but can be a bit boring at times. Call it too nerdy, if you like.
